title: The Towering Giraffe
description: Giraffes are the tallest mammals on Earth, known for their extremely long necks and legs, and distinct coat patterns. They are native to Africa.

questions.question: How do giraffes typically get their drinking water?
options: They drink from rivers and lakes like most animals
They absorb it from the leaves and plants they eat
They get it from underground sources
They store it in their humps
questions.correct_answer: They absorb it from the leaves and plants they eat
